3698d44a-462c-4e25-a7af-d2b711b28954.text:
- You can now choose to open a trade whenever entry conditions are met, e.g. intraday movement, regardless of the specific time. Toggle "Use Floating Entry Time" and optionally specify min and max entry times.

- VIX9D / VIX ratio is now available as both entry and exit conditions. This raio is useful for trading when short-term volatility is especially high or low. Toggle "Use VIX" to enable these filters.

- Test averages and min/max values are now per-lot. You must re-run your tests in order to see this change.

- Trades can now be sorted by Max Drawdown.
